testcase.name: Bein Sports Connect Australia Subscription Test Case
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home Page..................................................passed When user clicks Subscribe button...........................................passed Then user is directed to subscription page and displays package options.....passed When user chooses Monthly Plan with Two Week Free Trial and clicks Subscribe button.passed Then user is directed to Create Account screen..............................passed When user fills Create Account form with first name Nil ,lastname Rakici ,password and a random email.passed And clicks Create Account button............................................passed Then a new account is created and payment method screen is displayed........passed And user validates the package price........................................passed When user makes payment with credit card....................................passed Then user expects for a total charge of 1.00 since this is a free trial package.passed When user provides a test card data detail cardname Test Test , card number 5890040000000016 , verification number 000 and confirm payment.passed Then user displays a error text.............................................passed
